title: Serif font to pair with Barmeno
content: I'm doing a slight redesign for a magazine which currently uses Barmeno as it's main font. The editor wants to keep this as he thinks it gives the title a modern, friendly look. Any suggestions for serif fonts I can pair with Barmeno? I was thinking of using barmeno for heading and the serif for the text... I am a bit of a beginner when it comes to typography! There is no budget to buy new fonts so I would be using ones supplied with the Adobe suite. Thanks for any suggestions!
author: Hanr

comments.content:
Is Weidemann included?  
I never tried to use Weidemann with Barmeno but it might be worth a try.
You might try Chaparral, I think it's included.
Thanks for the suggestions - of the two, I think I prefer Chaparral. Thanks for both ideas though :)
